Uses of Class
Obstacles.Obstacle

  • Packages that use Obstacle 
    Package Description
    Game  
    Obstacles  

    • Uses of Obstacle in Game

      Methods in Game that return types with arguments of type Obstacle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Obstacle> Area.getObstacles() 
      Methods in Game with parameters of type Obstacle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Area.addObstacle(Obstacle obstacle)
      Adds an Obstacle to the obstacles ArrayList
      void Area.removeObstacle(Obstacle o)
      Is used to "destroy" an Obstacle, it actually just makes it invisible and not solid to avoid Errors
      Method parameters in Game with type arguments of type Obstacle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Area.addObstacles(java.util.ArrayList<Obstacle> obstacles)
      Adds an ArrayList of Obstacles to the obstacles ArrayList

    • Uses of Obstacle in Obstacles

      Subclasses of Obstacle in Obstacles 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Brick
      A breakable Obstacle
      class  FinishLine
      An object that triggers the next Area when crossed
      class  Ground
      An unbreakable Obstacle that represents the bottom of the Area
      class  Pipe
      An object that when Mario uses it, a different Area is displayed
      class  QuestionBlock
      Unbreakable Obstacle that when hit, turns brown and dispenses an Item
